comments.body:
Added note to setup instructions as suggested.  Change will be reflected in 
next release and next web site update.

description:
The documentation tells users to run make for bulding the unix daemon, connectors, and other C/
C++ code throughout the tomcat project.

It would be helpful to point out that they must run the gnu make (gmake) command to get the 
compile to work instead of the native bsd make on freebsd systems.
summary: Documentation change needed for making unix daemon
